reviews.review: This movie is very entertaining. I didn't like some of the characters being killed.
applaud to graphic designers but childish contents
Phenomenal direction great performances but the pacing is eh and the there is way to much shacky cam
Great movie with so many surprises and enthralling moments. Best of the marvel universe so far

To say this is the best avengers is an understatement and also it can't be judged individually because it's the culmination of all ten years of marvel movies. From beginning to end this movie keeps your attention and builds a narrative that is beyond a single storyline but 30 interwoven lives. All these lives center around one of the most complicated and relatable villains in film history the mad titan thanos. He is so easy to hate with a deep seething hatred but also admired for his dedication and perseverance. All of our heroes get to fight the inevitable end as hard as they can and yes mistakes are made. The humanizing mistakes and decisions make our heroes tangible and grounded. The powerful evolutions of our avengers are amazing to see, a superior spiderman, a lightning slinging thor with a magical weapon, a hugely upgraded modular nanotech ironman, and everyone fully upgraded and seasoned. I give this 5 stars because to bring together a movie like this with each character represented and appreciated is impossible but they did it and did it impossibly well.

Really a great movie. It had the acting. It had the special effects. It had the script. It even had some meme-worthy quotes. Recommend having watched several Marvel movies first- especially the Avenger movies and Gaurdians of the Galaxy. Also, Captain America, Dr. Strange, and Black Panther would have been helpful.

This is the best Marvel film. Thanos has brilliant character development. Every character feels so real and you feel for them on this journey. It's a film that even new comers who won't understand will like.

I could not believe this film was over two hours! This movie was fast, tight and filled with such great writing and directing! With a ton of Marvel characters in this film,each and every one had a chance to truly shine! And talk about cliffhangers!!! Cannot wait to see the next installment! :)
